# Government Tender Announcement #4W002-240063
================================ ";

### Tender Title
#### Strategic IT Security Planning and Protection Consultant

We are pleased to share the details of a Request for Proposal (RFP) launched by Prairies Economic Development Canada (PrairiesCan). The bid calls for the services of a Strategic IT Security Planning and Protection Consultant to enhance the organization's cyber security posture and address areas for improvement.

### Request for Proposal Identification
* Solicitation Number: `4W002-240063`
* RFP Title: Strategic IT Security Planning and Protection Consultant
* Amendment Number: `4`
* RFP ID: `cb-58-88293591`

### Important Dates
* `2024-01-03`: Tender Notice Publication Date
* `2024-01-22 16:00:00`: Tender Closing Date
* `2024-01-22`: Amendment Date
* `2024-02-01`: Expected Contract Start Date
* `2025-01-31`: Expected Contract End Date

### RFP Details
The successful contractor will provide services across various regions, including Saskatchewan, Alberta, and Manitoba in Canada.

### Required Services
The contractor will assist PrairiesCan in enhancing its cyber security posture and identifying areas for improvement. The services include:

* Strategic IT Security Planning and Protection Consultant
* Performing Risk Assessment and Evaluation
* Providing Certification and Accreditation (C&A) analysis

### Selection Criteria
The proposal will be evaluated based on a combination of technical merit and price. The highest combined rating will determine the successful bidder.

### Contact Information
Ryan Bent is the designated contact person for this RFP. You can reach him at:
* Email: `ryan.bent@prairiescan.gc.ca`
* Phone: `(403) 921-7545`

### Additional Resources
The complete tender document is available for download at [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28638/tbips_npp_4w002-240063_en-%281.pdf) for English and [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28638/apn_spict_4w002-240063.pdf) for French.
